channel.title: HELP ON MAKING ADMINS ON RS2LegendzPkz SOURCE PLEASE HELP!@@@!
channel.description: I am having trouble making admins on the RS2LegendzPkz source that I downloaded please help me !!!!!!! :confused: :confused: :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: July 22, 2007, 06:18:29 PM[/size][hr]please help me its not working........

item.title: HELP ON MAKING ADMINS ON RS2LegendzPkz SOURCE PLEASE HELP!@@@!
item.dc:creator: @darkandlightjak5 darkandlightjak5
item.description:
@darkandlightjak5 wrote:

you go into characters, choose the character you want to be admin, and change his player rights to 1 for moderator, 2 for admin, and 3 for co-owner

Stop double posting.

Read full topic
item.source: HELP ON MAKING ADMINS ON RS2LegendzPkz SOURCE PLEASE HELP!@@@!
